label.intro:
This case study is a crop breeding study which highlights complexity. The aim is not to find a 'best' variety it is to explore the potential of biofortification across environments to establish the potential of future breeding programmes.

This case study is referred to in a number of topics including:

Topic I: Starting a research process

  • How to Read (Finding out what you donâ€™t know)
  • Research in the context of development


Topic VI: Design principles

  • Measure and Ignore
